ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 222
ygData.msgSnippet: to end the debate, yes, heals work on pets.  mages i dont know about, but i havent heard they *didnt* so i assume they can be healed also. we have pet heal
ygData.messageBody:
to end the debate, yes, heals work on pets. mages i dont know about, but i
havent heard they *didnt* so i assume they can be healed also.
we have pet heal spells
A. so we can heal our pets (my flair for the obvious)
B. they use less mana since it is a specialized spell (i guess)
i would imagine they would be adding 2 more pet heals, because the final one
comes at L29 i think (renew bones). thats a big gap to 49, and the amount
healed is probably insignificant at higher lvls.

belphenor

>From: Aazen1@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com

>I wasn't sure if regular heals worked on our pets, but I know for a FACT
>that

>could
>just sit back and keep his pet healed.
>

>
> Naeeldar
